names.pinyin: su xiao ke tu ling sheng fa jing (topical)

actions: Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood, nourishes Jing and expels Wind from the skin by nourishing the Blood.
Tonifies Kidney Yang and stimulates hair growth topically.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and opens the channels.
Dries Dampness, kills parasites and stops itching topically Warms and tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang
